title: Introduction to R Workshop Series
text:
In January and February 2024, R-Ladies Ottawa hosted a 3-part Introduction to R workshop series.

You can find the materials from the workshops below:

Introduction to R and RStudio [Event] [Recording] [Code]
Data Visualization I [Event] [Recording] [Code]
Data Visualization II [Event] [Recording] [Code]

title: Sponsors
text:
Sponsoring R-Ladies Ottawa is a great way to show your support for gender diversity in our community. You can support our local chapter with:

Venue space
Food and beverages
Prizes for coding challenges
Funding for any of the above

If you’re interested in sponsoring us, please contact the organizers via a direct message on our Meetup Group.

title: R-Ladies Ottawa
text: R-Ladies is a worldwide organization whose mission is to promote gender diversity in the R community. The R community suffers from an under-representation of minority genders (including but not limited to cis/trans women, trans men, non-binary, genderqueer, agender) in every role and area of participation, whether as leaders, package developers, conference speakers, conference participants, educators, or users.

title: R-Ladies Ottawa
text: R-Ladies is a worldwide organization whose mission is to promote gender diversity in the R community. The R community suffers from an under-representation of minority genders (including but not limited to cis/trans women, trans men, non-binary, genderqueer, agender) in every role and area of participation, whether as leaders, package developers, conference speakers, conference participants, educators, or users.

title: R-Ladies Ottawa
text:
About the Ottawa Chapter
This website is for the Ottawa chapter of R-Ladies. The Ottawa chapter was founded in 2018. After the pandemic, R-Ladies Ottawa “rebooted” in September 2023. As of February 2024, the Ottawa chapter has 672 members on Meetup!

title: R-Ladies Ottawa
text:
Interested in joining?






Important



Please note that the mission of R-Ladies is to increase gender diversity in the R community. While our Meetup Group is open to anyone to join, and while we welcome allies to our events as guests, our events are intended to provide a safe space for women and gender minorities.


The best way to keep up to date with our upcoming events is to join our Meetup Group. We post announcements regularly here!
If you are a woman or gender minority, we also recommend joining the global R-Ladies directory and the R-Ladies Community Slack. This is a great way to connect with R-Ladies from other chapters!

title: International Women’s Day Data Challenge 2024
text:
International Women’s Day takes place on March 8th, 2024. The theme for this year is “Invest in women: Accelerate progress”.
In honour of this theme, R-Ladies Ottawa is hosting a data challenge!

title: International Women’s Day Data Challenge 2024
text:
Challenge
Details will be posted soon.

title: International Women’s Day Data Challenge 2024
text:
Guidelines
Although this challenge is hosted by R-Ladies Ottawa, you don’t have to use R to participate. You could use R, Python, a combination of the two, or anything you’re comfortable with!
No previous programming experience is required! If you’re interested in participating, but aren’t sure where to start, check out the recordings from our Introduction to R workshops that we hosted in early 2024. The workshops will give you a solid foundation in data analysis and data visualization using R.
While anyone is welcome to participate in the challenge and submit an entry, only submissions by women and gender minorities who reside in Canada will be eligible for the prizes.
You can participate individually, or in teams of up to 5 people!

title: International Women’s Day Data Challenge 2024
section: Need help finding a team member?
text:
Need help finding a team member?
If you’re interested in participating in the challenge as part of a team, but need help finding team members, come to our International Women’s Day Networking Event and Data Challenge Kickoff on March 8th!

title: International Women’s Day Data Challenge 2024
text:
Prizes
There will be a prize for each of the following categories:

Crowd favourite solution
Most innovative solution
Most aesthetically pleasing solution

Prize details will be released at a later date.

title: International Women’s Day Data Challenge 2024
text:
How to submit an entry
Details will be added soon.

title: International Women’s Day Data Challenge 2024
text:
How will winners be decided?
After the submission deadline, a voting link will be sent to the R-Ladies Ottawa Meetup Group. One vote per member of the group will be allowed.

title: International Women’s Day Data Challenge 2024
text:
Showcasing your analysis
In May 2024, R-Ladies Ottawa will host a virtual event where participants can showcase their work (Date and time will be announced soon). This is a great way to learn from one another and to connect with other like-minded individuals!
